languages.text: "Отставить ныть госпо{mf|дину|же} Вольному Торговцу, салага! Ваша Светлость, разрешите доложить! Несем охранение временного лазарета для пострадавших! Господин губернатор с сержантом Малгаром там, на посадочных, планируют эвакуацию!"

"Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"
languages.original_text: "Отставить ныть госпо{mf|дину|же} Вольному Торговцу, салага! Ваша Светлость, разрешите доложить! Несем охранение временного лазарета для пострадавших! Господин губернатор с сержантом Малгаром там, на посадочных, планируют эвакуацию!"

traits.locale_text: "Cease your snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary for the injured! Both the governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

"Cease your snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary for the injured! Both the governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

"Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

"Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

"Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

"Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

languages.text: "Hört auf zu jammern, Rekrut! Ihr sprecht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht erstatten zu dürfen! Wir wurden postiert, um das Feldlazarett zu bewachen! Der Gouverneur und Sergeant Malgar sind drüben bei den Landeplattformen und planen die Evakuierung!"
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf zu jammern, Rekrut! Ihr sprecht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht erstatten zu dürfen! Wir wurden postiert, um das Feldlazarett zu bewachen! Der Gouverneur und Sergeant Malgar sind drüben bei den Landeplattformen und planen die Evakuierung!"

languages.text: « Arrêtez de geindre, recrue ! Vous vous adressez à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! Votre Seigneurie, voici mon rapport ! On nous a demandé de garder l'hôpital de campagne ! Le gouverneur et le sergent Malgar sont aux plateformes d'atterrissage, ils préparent l'évacuation ! »
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez de geindre, recrue ! Vous vous adressez à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! Votre Seigneurie, voici mon rapport ! On nous a demandé de garder l'hôpital de campagne ! Le gouverneur et le sergent Malgar sont aux plateformes d'atterrissage, ils préparent l'évacuation ! »

languages.text: “别再哭哭啼啼了，新兵！站在你面前的是行商浪人！大人，请允许我进行报告！我们被派遣守卫战地医务室！总督和马尔加军士就在停机坪那边，正在准备撤离行动！”
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: “别再哭哭啼啼了，新兵！站在你面前的是行商浪人！大人，请允许我进行报告！我们被派遣守卫战地医务室！总督和马尔加军士就在停机坪那边，正在准备撤离行动！”

languages.text: 「鼻水垂らしてるんじゃない、新人！自由開拓者の御前だぞ！陛下、ご報告させていただきます。野戦病院防衛の位置につきました！総督とマルガー軍曹は離着陸プラットフォームで退避を図っております！」
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: 「泣くんじゃない、新人！自由開拓者の御前だぞ！陛下、ご報告させていただきます。野戦病院防衛の位置につきました！総督とマルガー軍曹は離着陸プラットフォームで退避を図っております！」

languages.text: «¡Deje de lloriquear, recluta! ¡Está hablando con {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente! ¡{mf|Milord|Milady}, permiso para informar! ¡Tenemos órdenes de defender el hospital de campaña! ¡El gobernador y el sargento Malgar están en las plataformas de aterrizaje organizando la evacuación!».
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Deje de lloriquear, recluta! ¡Está hablando con {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente! ¡{mf|Milord|Milady}, permiso para informar! ¡Tenemos órdenes de defender el hospital de campaña! ¡El gobernador y el sargento Malgar están en las plataformas de aterrizaje organizando la evacuación!».

languages.text: "Sızlanmayı kes asker! Bir Hür Tacir'in huzurundasın! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yüksek müsaadenizle rapor vereyim! Sahra hastanesini korumakla görevlendirildik! Vali ve Çavuş Malgar, iniş rampasında tahliyeyi planlıyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "Stop snivelling, recruit! You're addressing a Rogue Trader! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, permission to report! We've been posted to guard the field infirmary! The governor and Sergeant Malgar are over at the landing pads, planning the evacuation!"

traits.locale_text: "Sızlanmayı kes asker! Bir Hür Tacir'in huzurundasın! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yüksek müsaadenizle rapor vereyim! Sahra hastanesini korumakla görevlendirildik! Vali ve Çavuş Malgar, iniş rampasında tahliyeyi planlıyorlar!"
